item.description: Welcome to The FAN (New England Friends Activity Network) Alliance. The FAN Alliance is a series of related general activities meetups. The FAN Alliance does not discriminate with the exception that you are expected to be an adult nor do we charge event or membership fees. The goal of this alliance is that it is a fun and safe environment for everyone. By joining you are implicitly agreeing to respect other members privacy. Both Singles and People in Committed Relationships are welcome! This meetup is the general activity meetup and the center of the FAN Alliance. The goal of the management is to make this meetup as the general repository of all Alliance meetups. It is recomended that if you are a member of any Alliance meetup, that you also join this one. Click here for a list of Alliance Meetups: http://socialnetwork.meetup.com/442/pages/Alliance/
item.name: The FAN Alliance
